review: The fire TV stick is extremely slow. Our network is fast and we have no issues, but a lot of times we have to wait while games, TV shows, movies, etc load. We also get kicked off a lot while viewing.The wireless controllers are also very costly. For a $40 steaming device, controllers for games that don't compare to Microsoft and Sony gaming consoles should not have controllers that are just as expensive.
author: Lynnegerde

review: I received the TV stick right when I expected to, and the setup was just as simple as it was made out to be (although I was a little surprised that it needed to be plugged in separately).  My only gripe is that while all Amazon Prime content plays flawlessly, and this might just be the app, but sometimes the video and audio don't sync up perfectly on the HBO GO app.  I never have this problem on my computer, though.
